bibl.title: The Map of an Armchair Traveller.
bibl.note: Specimen of the method adopted in the compilation of the Catalogue of the Toponyms of the Herakleopolite Nome and in drawing the Map that goes with it. [See now: EADEM, The Herakleopolite Nome. A Catalogue of the Toponyms, with Introduction and Commentary = American Studies in Papyrology. 37 (Atlanta, Georgia, 1998).]

bibl.title: Atti del XXII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. Firenze, 23-29 agosto 1998. Volume I

bibl.seg: FALIVENE Maria Rosaria, The Map of an Armchair Traveller.

Isabella ANDORLINI, Guido BASTIANINI, Manfredo MANFREDI e Giovanna MENCI (a cura di), Atti del XXII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. Firenze, 23-29 agosto 1998. Volume I (Firenze, 2001) pp. 421-425.

Specimen of the method adopted in the compilation of the Catalogue of the Toponyms of the Herakleopolite Nome and in drawing the Map that goes with it. [See now: EADEM, The Herakleopolite Nome. A Catalogue of the Toponyms, with Introduction and Commentary = American Studies in Papyrology. 37 (Atlanta, Georgia, 1998).]
